hero.title: KaiYuanShe
hero.subtitle: Rooted in China, contributing globally, promoting open source as a new era lifestyle.

features.title: Core Features
features.description: DevPlaza provides developers with an efficient one-stop experience by integrating Web3 multi-chain data, events, and community content

multiChain.title: Multi-chain Aggregation
multiChain.description: Unified integration of activities, articles, blogs, and community dynamics from multiple Web3 chains such as Ethereum

analytics.title: Developer Analytics
analytics.description: Real-time collection and statistics of developer data to help discover ecosystem trends and activity

content.title: Content Aggregation
content.description: Cross-platform integration of the latest Web3 news and quality articles to reduce information fragmentation

ecosystem.title: Ecosystem Navigation
ecosystem.description: Panoramic display of ecosystem DApps and projects for developers to quickly understand and participate

resources.title: Learning Resources
resources.description: Help developers quickly transition from Web2 to Web3 through tutorials, articles, and documentation

tutorials.title: Tutorials
tutorials.description: Learn systematically how to build Web3 applications from scratch

codeExamples.title: Code Examples
codeExamples.description: Reference open source projects and quickly master best practices

ecosystemGuide.title: Ecosystem Guide
ecosystemGuide.description: Comprehensive understanding of the latest Web3 developments and projects

cta.title: Join DevPlaza · Witness Your Web3 Growth Journey
cta.description: Whether you are a Web2 developer or already committed to Web3, DevPlaza provides you with the most comprehensive resources and platform.

footer.title: KaiYuanShe
footer.description: KaiYuanShe is a one-stop plaza that aggregates Web3 events, communities, articles, and developer data.
